SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.cinematics.helper

Klasse CinematicBoxListingController

java.lang.Object
org.com.controller.cinematics.helper.CinematicBoxListingController
public class CinematicBoxListingController extends Object
Controller for managing the listing of Cinematic objects in a grid format. This controller handles the sorting, filtering, and search functionality for displaying Cinematic items based on their type and user preferences. It also manages the caching of views for each Cinematic to optimize performance. A single instance you can see here CinematicBoxController.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, configuring the UI components such as the Cinematic container, the sort combo box, and the search field listener.

    • configureCinematicsContainer

      private void configureCinematicsContainer()
      Configures the cinematics container to have a fixed number of columns and defined gaps.

    • configureSortComboBox

      private void configureSortComboBox()
      Configures the sort combo box with available sorting options and sets the default value.

    • configureSearchListener

      private void configureSearchListener()
      Sets up a listener for changes in the search field to filter and sort the Cinematic list dynamically.

    • setCinematics

      public void setCinematics(List<Cinematic> cinematics, Type type)
      Sets the list of Cinematics and their type to be displayed, caches their views, and triggers filtering and sorting.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - The list of Cinematics to display.
      type - The type of Cinematics (e.g., MOVIE, SERIES, etc.).

    • clearCacheIfTypeChanged

      private void clearCacheIfTypeChanged(Type type)
      Clears the view cache if the Cinematic type has changed.
      Parameter:
      type - The new Cinematic type.

    • cacheMovieViews

      private void cacheMovieViews(List<Cinematic> cinematics)
      Caches the views for each Cinematic object by loading and storing them in a map.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - The list of Cinematics to cache views for.

    • createAndCacheView

      private void createAndCacheView(Cinematic cinematic)
      Creates and caches a view for a Cinematic object.
      Parameter:
      cinematic - The Cinematic object for which to create a view.

    • filterAndSortCinematics

      private void filterAndSortCinematics()
      Filters and sorts the list of Cinematics based on the selected search term and sorting option, and updates the display.
